name: SKProduct
desc: Information about a product previously registered in App Store Connect.

items.name: var productIdentifier: String
items.desc: The string that identifies the product to the Apple App Store.

items.name: var contentVersion: String
items.desc: A string that identifies the version of the content.

items.name: var isFamilyShareable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the product is available for family sharing in App Store Connect.

items.name: var price: NSDecimalNumber
items.desc: The cost of the product in the local currency.

items.name: var priceLocale: Locale
items.desc: The locale used to format the price of the product.

items.name: var introductoryPrice: SKProductDiscount?
items.desc: The object containing introductory price information for the product.

items.name: var discounts: [SKProductDiscount]
items.desc: An array of subscription offers available for the auto-renewable subscription.

items.name: class SKProductDiscount
items.desc: The details of an introductory offer or a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.

items.name: var subscriptionGroupIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier of the subscription group to which the subscription belongs.

items.name: var subscriptionPeriod: SKProductSubscriptionPeriod?
items.desc: The period details for products that are subscriptions.

items.name: class SKProductSubscriptionPeriod
items.desc: An object containing the subscription period duration information.

items.name: enum SKProduct.PeriodUnit
items.desc: Values representing the duration of an interval, from a day up to a year.

items.name: var isDownloadable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store has downloadable content for this product.

items.name: var downloadContentLengths: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The lengths of the downloadable files available for this product.

items.name: var downloadContentVersion: String
items.desc: A string that identifies which version of the content is available for download.
